column1: #Text=Korra says : " Do n't try to stop me and do n't follow me .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " I tried to talk her out of it too , but she 's made up her mind .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " We 'll be watching the island closely .
#Text=If anything goes wrong , I have a fleet of police airships ready to swoop down .
#Text=" Korra says : " Guess you 're a no - show , Amon .
